title: Fan Video Friday - "Believer"
body:
Fan Video Friday - “Believer” #StarWars #WonderWoman #Marvel #DoctorWho #TheXFiles

Posted by Kim & Sage

Hope you all safely enjoyed celebrating Captain America’s 100th birthday this week. (Don’t worry, he’s in here somwhere.)

We’re back with another Fan Video Friday, this one dedicated to Imagine Dragons’ intense, drum-heavy single “Believer.” It’s proven to be quite the popular choice for scoring fan-made montages, particularly for action-packed shows about morally…

blog.name: pendantstyles
blog.title: you bring me home
blog.description:
hannah | vision isn’t 20/20, but harry is!!

+ requests are always open! +

masterlist

summary: Ooh Harry travelling the world, y'know cos of touring, when in every city / country he's in, he buys a souvenir for the missus.
question: Ooh Harry travelling the world, y'know cos of touring, when in every city / country he's in, he buys a souvenir for the missus.
answer: maple syrup in canada, a jersey from chicago, a guitar keychain from nashville, an empire state building from new york and absolutely anything else from everywhere he’s visited. harry would sometimes call the missus on what she wants but sometimes he doesn’t because he wants it to be a surprise and then god harry would bring home a blanket from every place he’s visited in the tour. missus likes blankets and even if she’s only asked for one, he gave her all. i am warm. i am awed. i am incredibly soft.

blog.name: strange-presence
blog.title: sarah
blog.description: currently inactive || follow my side blog soft-foxxay

body:
I’m Sorry IV

Warning: the scene below will make you cry, die or anything else, emotional care is important. But who cares about warnings, go on read and enjoy :).

Your heart was torn, and you no longer had a heart because of the words your ears just cought.

(What really happened during the accident)

Something happened within a second, a car suddenly hit yours strongly, throwing you completely to the other side.

Your head hit the glass window next to you hard, causing the glass to break into pieces.

You were totally unconscious, you body was randomly lying on the front seat, and the bleeding from the gash on your forehead seemed unstoppable.

In the time you were unconscious, he was still awake, struggling with endless pain in the right side of his body, where he was hit.

As he could assume, he had couple broken ribs, at least, a broken pelvic as well.

“Y/N, don’t worry, I’ll-” His jaw dropped at the view of you, while his heart went missing beats.

At the view of you, his mental pain was a lot more than the physical pain he was feeling. As if the moment his eyes fell on you completely numbed his physical pain, only to let the mental pain take over.

His hand could roughly reach to yours, he couldn’t move a bit of him because of the powerfully tough pain that was about to kill him, even though he tried, he tried to ignore it in order to reach to you, but all his attempt culminated in failure, his pain totally restrained him from even making the most simple of moves.

“YN, please tell me if you can hear me.” His voice was weak, almost disappearing in the air.

He was searching his pockets for his phone to call help when he realize that you were on the edge, about to fall down within any moment, and death will be your inevitable destiny.

Undesirably, the car slowly descended down, moving so slowly that it looked as if it wasn’t moving at all, resembling the motion of the sand, until the whole body of the car was pushed down.

He looked for a safe way to get out of the car, without getting hurt, for you in particular. But he failed, because getting out of it seemed very impossible. And he was raided by time, and time of survival was up when the car slid down completely, making the chances of getting out alive completely beyond impossible. This was it, there’s no way you can survive it.

without a second thought, he bent over you in order to protect you, making himself as a human shield to keep you away from all the harms, to take them himself. non caring if this will kill him immediately, cause the only thing his care was focused on was your own safety, and your own survival, every other thing was at the bottom of his list.

“Please God keep her alive, even if this means taking my soul instead, I-I don’t care.” His voice quietly shuddered out of his lips forming a shaking whisper.

“I don’t care, I don’t..” His words went on faintly cracking until they were no longer heard.

The car continued rolling down fast, and with each time it hit the ground even harder, until it finally settled upside down on the ground down there after it was strongly hit.

What kind of help can reach to you after you both had possibly died?

-—

“They’re alive! James quickly call an ambulance! Hurry!” Only the voice of ambulances & alarms could be heard all over the place.

_________

You went to talk to Harry, maybe for the last time. You sat down on the same chair while you were crying more than you thought you would ever do. You held his hand and squeezed it hard, cause you wanted to feel him, for the very last time.

“You were trying to protect me with everything I said to you! With all the pain I caused you! How can you be so good this way! My whole life, I was such an unbearable human and no one bears me! But you did! And now you’re leaving! You are leaving me alone with no one by my side! You think my life is gonna be good after you! How can I-” You couldn’t continue cause you were sobbing.

He was trying to protect you, giving you his life with nothing in return, and you only took it for granted, very unthankfully, you were totally careless towards him and his feelings, and you didn’t care about the pain your words caused him, that  the last sentence you told him was “I don’t trust you!”

You were thinking what type of human are you and what type is he. You knew, that you are the worst person alive and now, you were losing a treasure. Your tears were unstoppable, and your pain was unbelievable.

“Stay with me, please.” You begged weakly through your sobs, weaker than you ever thought you’d be one day.

“If I knew you’d leave this way, the I would never leave you, I would never say any painful words to you, but if only I knew. Why are you leaving quickly? You have a very long lifetime to live. Just don’t- don’t go!” You begged while you continued crying.

You were getting weaker and weaker every second. You were barely breathing cause the air suddenly got thicker, and it barely gets in and out your lungs. Words barely leaving your mouth and your tears falling hard from your red eyes. Your hope disappeared to be dust. Thinking, how your life is gonna be without him?

Then suddenly, his body began to shake weirdly, his heartbeats went insane, they were going fast then slow, everything went wrong within a second. You quickly ran out calling a doctor, you have never been afraid more than now.

I hope you enjoyed :). 10 notes for the coming update?

Undesirably, the car slowly descended down, moving so slowly that it looked as if it wasn’t moving at all, resembling the motion of the sand, until the whole body of the car was pushed down.

He looked for a safe way to get out of the car, without getting hurt, for you in particular. But he failed, because getting out of it seemed very impossible. And he was raided by time, and time of survival was up when the car slid down completely, making the chances of getting out alive completely beyond impossible. This was it, there’s no way you can survive it.

without a second thought, he bent over you in order to protect you, making himself as a human shield to keep you away from all the harms, to take them himself. non caring if this will kill him immediately, cause the only thing his care was focused on was your own safety, and your own survival, every other thing was at the bottom of his list.

“Please God keep her alive, even if this means taking my soul instead, I-I don’t care.” His voice quietly shuddered out of his lips forming a shaking whisper.

“I don’t care, I don’t..” His words went on faintly cracking until they were no longer heard.

The car continued rolling down fast, and with each time it hit the ground even harder, until it finally settled upside down on the ground down there after it was strongly hit.

What kind of help can reach to you after you both had possibly died?

-—

“They’re alive! James quickly call an ambulance! Hurry!” Only the voice of ambulances & alarms could be heard all over the place.

_________

You went to talk to Harry, maybe for the last time. You sat down on the same chair while you were crying more than you thought you would ever do. You held his hand and squeezed it hard, cause you wanted to feel him, for the very last time.

“You were trying to protect me with everything I said to you! With all the pain I caused you! How can you be so good this way! My whole life, I was such an unbearable human and no one bears me! But you did! And now you’re leaving! You are leaving me alone with no one by my side! You think my life is gonna be good after you! How can I-” You couldn’t continue cause you were sobbing.

He was trying to protect you, giving you his life with nothing in return, and you only took it for granted, very unthankfully, you were totally careless towards him and his feelings, and you didn’t care about the pain your words caused him, that  the last sentence you told him was “I don’t trust you!”

You were thinking what type of human are you and what type is he. You knew, that you are the worst person alive and now, you were losing a treasure. Your tears were unstoppable, and your pain was unbelievable.

“Stay with me, please.” You begged weakly through your sobs, weaker than you ever thought you’d be one day.

“If I knew you’d leave this way, the I would never leave you, I would never say any painful words to you, but if only I knew. Why are you leaving quickly? You have a very long lifetime to live. Just don’t- don’t go!” You begged while you continued crying.

You were getting weaker and weaker every second. You were barely breathing cause the air suddenly got thicker, and it barely gets in and out your lungs. Words barely leaving your mouth and your tears falling hard from your red eyes. Your hope disappeared to be dust. Thinking, how your life is gonna be without him?

Then suddenly, his body began to shake weirdly, his heartbeats went insane, they were going fast then slow, everything went wrong within a second. You quickly ran out calling a doctor, you have never been afraid more than now.

I hope you enjoyed :). 10 notes for the coming update?
trail.content:
I’m Sorry IV

Warning: the scene below will make you cry, die or anything else, emotional care is important. But who cares about warnings, go on read and enjoy :).

Your heart was torn, and you no longer had a heart because of the words your ears just cought.

(What really happened during the accident)

Something happened within a second, a car suddenly hit yours strongly, throwing you completely to the other side.

Your head hit the glass window next to you hard, causing the glass to break into pieces.

You were totally unconscious, you body was randomly lying on the front seat, and the bleeding from the gash on your forehead seemed unstoppable.

In the time you were unconscious, he was still awake, struggling with endless pain in the right side of his body, where he was hit.

As he could assume, he had couple broken ribs, at least, a broken pelvic as well.

“Y/N, don’t worry, I’ll-” His jaw dropped at the view of you, while his heart went missing beats.

At the view of you, his mental pain was a lot more than the physical pain he was feeling. As if the moment his eyes fell on you completely numbed his physical pain, only to let the mental pain take over.

His hand could roughly reach to yours, he couldn’t move a bit of him because of the powerfully tough pain that was about to kill him, even though he tried, he tried to ignore it in order to reach to you, but all his attempt culminated in failure, his pain totally restrained him from even making the most simple of moves.

“YN, please tell me if you can hear me.” His voice was weak, almost disappearing in the air.

He was searching his pockets for his phone to call help when he realize that you were on the edge, about to fall down within any moment, and death will be your inevitable destiny.

Undesirably, the car slowly descended down, moving so slowly that it looked as if it wasn’t moving at all, resembling the motion of the sand, until the whole body of the car was pushed down.

He looked for a safe way to get out of the car, without getting hurt, for you in particular. But he failed, because getting out of it seemed very impossible. And he was raided by time, and time of survival was up when the car slid down completely, making the chances of getting out alive completely beyond impossible. This was it, there’s no way you can survive it.

without a second thought, he bent over you in order to protect you, making himself as a human shield to keep you away from all the harms, to take them himself. non caring if this will kill him immediately, cause the only thing his care was focused on was your own safety, and your own survival, every other thing was at the bottom of his list.

“Please God keep her alive, even if this means taking my soul instead, I-I don’t care.” His voice quietly shuddered out of his lips forming a shaking whisper.

“I don’t care, I don’t..” His words went on faintly cracking until they were no longer heard.

The car continued rolling down fast, and with each time it hit the ground even harder, until it finally settled upside down on the ground down there after it was strongly hit.

What kind of help can reach to you after you both had possibly died?

-—

“They’re alive! James quickly call an ambulance! Hurry!” Only the voice of ambulances & alarms could be heard all over the place.

_________

You went to talk to Harry, maybe for the last time. You sat down on the same chair while you were crying more than you thought you would ever do. You held his hand and squeezed it hard, cause you wanted to feel him, for the very last time.

“You were trying to protect me with everything I said to you! With all the pain I caused you! How can you be so good this way! My whole life, I was such an unbearable human and no one bears me! But you did! And now you’re leaving! You are leaving me alone with no one by my side! You think my life is gonna be good after you! How can I-” You couldn’t continue cause you were sobbing.

He was trying to protect you, giving you his life with nothing in return, and you only took it for granted, very unthankfully, you were totally careless towards him and his feelings, and you didn’t care about the pain your words caused him, that  the last sentence you told him was “I don’t trust you!”

You were thinking what type of human are you and what type is he. You knew, that you are the worst person alive and now, you were losing a treasure. Your tears were unstoppable, and your pain was unbelievable.

“Stay with me, please.” You begged weakly through your sobs, weaker than you ever thought you’d be one day.

“If I knew you’d leave this way, the I would never leave you, I would never say any painful words to you, but if only I knew. Why are you leaving quickly? You have a very long lifetime to live. Just don’t- don’t go!” You begged while you continued crying.

You were getting weaker and weaker every second. You were barely breathing cause the air suddenly got thicker, and it barely gets in and out your lungs. Words barely leaving your mouth and your tears falling hard from your red eyes. Your hope disappeared to be dust. Thinking, how your life is gonna be without him?

Then suddenly, his body began to shake weirdly, his heartbeats went insane, they were going fast then slow, everything went wrong within a second. You quickly ran out calling a doctor, you have never been afraid more than now.

I hope you enjoyed :). 10 notes for the coming update?

summary: Little Love:  8pm AEST updates every second day.  With thanks to: Beta writer @whoopsharrystyles / Pregnancy Stuff...
caption:
Little Love: 

8pm AEST updates every second day.

With thanks to:

Beta writer @whoopsharrystyles / Pregnancy Stuff @geenalovesthelittlethings / and for listening to me for months @all-the-love-harold

Evie Jones, thought that she had her life figured out, all of her ducks were in a perfectly aligned row, until something happened, one little emotion that shook her life up like an earthquake knocking everything she knew to the floor. Love was what had gotten her into this mess but it could also dig her out. She has no love for her ex who cheated on her, she has a lot of love for her best friend who she is to afraid to tell and she has a little love growing inside her and she doesn’t know who the father is. 

*update times are aest

Chapter One:

“A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.” — Elbert Hubbard

Chapter Two:

“All the world is made of faith, and trust, and pixie dust.” ― J.M. Barrie, Peter Pan

Chapter Three:

“It’s all right to love someone who doesn’t love you back, as long as they’re worth you loving them. As long as they deserve it.” ― Cassandra Clare, Clockwork Angel

Chapter Four: 

“There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.” ― Albert Einstein

Chapter Five:

“You know you’re in love when you can’t fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.” ― Dr. Seuss

Chapter Six:

“We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.” ― Oscar Wilde, Lady Windermere’s Fan

Chapter Seven:

“Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that.” ― Martin Luther King Jr., A Testament of Hope: The Essential Writings and Speeches

Chapter Eight: 

“It is better to love wisely, no doubt: but to love foolishly is better than not to be able to love at all.” – Vanity Fair, William Thackeray

Chapter Nine: 

“Life is a book, and there are a thousand pages I have not yet read. I would read them together with you, as many as I can, before I die.” ― Cassandra Clare, Clockwork Princess

Chapter Ten:

“Take my hand, take my whole life too, for I can’t help falling in love with you.” — Elvis Presley

Instagram Posts:

Introducing Evie Jones

Evie on Tour 

Nora’s Birth

Texts:

Nora’s birth announcement (Nora’s birthday special) 

Evie misses Harry, but Harry misses Evie more
